metadata.title: CVE-2007-6762 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel before 2.6.20, there is an off-by-one bug innet/netlabel/netlabel_cipso_v4.c where it is possible to overflow thedoi_def->tags[] array.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
